content:
## Beginning

It still feels like a bubble.
A hazy one at that.
One I peak into occasionally!
Sometimes finding
A poor dad joke,
Or a funny anecdote.
Or a religious note!

But..
The surroundings reverberates..
With just
"He ain't here anymore".

He was right here,
And thenâ€¦ He was not.
We got cold hands,
Half a century worth of stories,
Loads of hugs,
And smiling tears.

This ain't anything but,
A beginning of an incomplete life!
